item.title: hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Holoearth Booth Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your support of Holoearth.Holoearth will be exhibiting a booth at â€œhololive SUPER EXPO 2026,â€ one of the largest offline events hosted by hololive production, to be held at Makuhari Messe from March 6 to 8, 2026.At the Holoearth booth, we plan to screen special footage from past events such as the â€œArrival Festivalsâ€ and â€œNePoLaBo Live,â€ featuring hololive production talents.There will also be displays where visitors experience Holoearthâ€™s journey so far in a real-world setting, including life-size panels of talents from past Arrival Festival events.We hope you enjoy the world of Holoearth at hololive SUPER EXPO 2026!

item.title: Octopus x hololive 3rd Generation Physical Card Collection is Now Available for Pre-Order!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 27, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce the renewed collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, unveiling a special series of physical Octopus card sets featuring the talents of hololive 3rd Generation.Octopus Card Collection DetailsThe hololive 3rd Generation Octopus Card collection comes in two versions: a Single Card Set and a Collectorâ€™s Set, tailored for both practical users and passionate collectors.Dressed in autumnâ€‘winter school uniforms, the four members are ready to accompany you across Hong Kongâ€”ride the MTR, board doubleâ€‘decker buses, tour on trams, and sail the harbourâ€”making them part of your daily commute and city exploration!Set Includes: ãƒ» hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card ãƒ» Octopus Card Holder with LanyardSet Includes: ãƒ» hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card ãƒ» Octopus Slide-on Card Holder ãƒ» Card Display Stand ãƒ» Acrylic Shikishi Artboard ãƒ» Gift Box PackagingPreâ€‘order your exclusive Octopus Card today and let hololive 3rd Generation members join you as you journey through Hong Kong!Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

item.title: hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S) is coming to Singapore on May 16, 2026!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 16, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce its participation in the special event, â€œhololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S).â€ This event will be held in Singapore onÂ May 16, 2026 as part of theÂ 60th Anniversary of the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between Japan and Singapore (SJ60).Four globally recognized hololive production talents representing different regions will participate: (hololive / Tokyo Tourism Ambassador): #hololive_SJ60: hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S): Saturday, May 16, 2026: Jurong East Stadium (Singapore): Albirex Niigata Singapore vs Young Lions: 3,500 spectators: SGD 21 (Â± JPY 2,500): DOU Creations Pte Ltd: Football Association of Singapore* The football match will be held as an official Singapore Premier League fixture. Separate match tickets are required.On match day, the stadium will be transformed into a unique entertainment experience combining real sports and virtual culture.Planned highlights include: ãƒ» Screening of original music videos ãƒ» Special greetings & Q&A session (pre-recorded) ãƒ» Multilingual challenge segment ãƒ» Exclusive halftime performanceIn addition, Mori Calliope is scheduled to host a YouTube mirror livestream, allowing fans worldwide to enjoy the event online.â– Livestream Schedule (Subject to Change) May 16, 2026 (Sat) 19:30 â€“ 22:30 (JST) A detailed timetable will be announced at a later date.SJ60 Limited-Edition Collaboration MerchandiseExclusive collaboration merchandise featuring newly illustrated visuals will be available both onsite and through advance online sales, through an event-exclusive website. Items ship to Japan and all 11 countries and regions in Southeast Asia. For detailed information, please visit the official collaboration website. ãƒ» Replica Uniform (1 type)ãƒ» Acrylic Stands (4 types): February 16, 2026, 10:00 (JST): March 1, 2026, 17:00 (JST)* With limited exceptions, merchandise will be available primarily through advance sales. * On-site sales on match day will be extremely limited. Advance purchase is strongly recommended. * Selected items will be available exclusively via pre-order.For online sales and the latest updates, please visit the official campaign website.Significance as an SJ60 Commemorative EventThis project represents a future-oriented cultural exchange, bringing together Japanâ€™s leading digital entertainment brand and Singaporeâ€™s community-rooted Japanese football club .Through the fusion of VTuber culture and live sports, the event aims to create an unprecedented celebration of friendship between Japan and Singapore for the next generation.: Official announcement & merchandise sales begin: Event dayDOU Creations Pte. Ltd. is a Singapore-based business strategy and marketing consultancy dedicated to breaking down market borders and supporting Japanese companies and content to expand overseas, particularly in Southeast Asia. The company provides comprehensive services spanning business strategy development, market research, product planning, and local execution of branding and marketing activities. With a mission to help Japanese products and cultural IP reach global audiences, DOU Creations has supported initiatives such as the operation of Japanese Film Week events and cultural festival booths abroad.

item.title: Notice of Price Changes (Feb 20 Update)
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for using the Holoearth service.In a commitment to a more accessible platform for users, we are sold in Holoearth.The revised prices can be confirmed in the in-app purchase screen from the effective date. There will be no change to the purchase price of HoloCoin (Premium). There will be no changes to content that has already been purchased. This revision applies only to ; user-made items will not be affected. Maintenance will be performed on . The specific time will be shared at a later date.Thank you for your continued support.

item.title: Tokyo Otaku Modeã€ã€Œhololive Meet Pop up Shop: Takinâ€¦
Visit both Tokyo Station and Narita Airport shops to get an exclusive postcard!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: To celebrate the opening of â€œhololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport!â€ we are excited to announce a special collaboration campaign with the â€œhololive production official shop in Tokyo Station.â€During the campaign period, bring a receipt from one shop to the other to receive an exclusive, limited-edition postcard (not for sale) as a special gift! Donâ€™t miss this chance to visit both locations and collect these unique rewards. Friday, February 13, 2026 â€“ Monday, March 9, 2026ãƒ» hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station Venue: Tokyo Character Street, B1, First Avenue Tokyo Stationhere for more details.ãƒ» hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport! Venue: Central Bldg. 4F, Terminal 1, Narita Airporthere for more details. 1. Make a purchase at either participating shop. 2. Bring your receipt to the other shop. 3. Show your receipt to the staff at the cashier to receive your postcard.* Staff will mark the receipt once the gift has been redeemed. The exclusive postcards (not for sale) come in 5 designs in total, and designs vary by shop and distribution period.ãƒ» At hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) â€“ Feb 27 (Fri) Phase 2: Feb 28 (Sat) â€“ Mar 9 (Mon)ãƒ» At hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) â€“ Feb 20 (Fri) Phase 2: Feb 21 (Sat) â€“ Feb 27 (Fri) Phase 3: Feb 28 (Sat) â€“ Mar 9 (Mon)ãƒ» Postcard designs will change according to the schedule at each shop. ãƒ» Supplies are limited and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis while stocks last. ãƒ» Only receipts issued during the campaign period (Feb 13 â€“ Mar 9, 2026) are valid for redemption. ãƒ» Each receipt is valid for one (1) postcard. ãƒ» We cannot accept returns or exchanges for the postcard, except in the case of defective items. ãƒ» Please check the official website of each facility for business hours and access information.

item.title: Funko POP! x hololive production Figurines Have Been Announced!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 2, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is thrilled to announce a collaboration with Funko, releasing a series of POP! collectibles featuring hololive production talents Sakura Miko, Mori Calliope, and Takanashi Kiara. This new collection marks the first collaboration between hololive production and Funko. Fans can look forward to these collectibles hitting shelves and opening for global purchase at a later date, also available on the hololive production OFFICIAL STORE from late March 2026.For more information on the product release, please visit Funkoâ€™s official website and social media platforms.Funko is a leading pop culture lifestyle brand that creates high quality products for fans to connect with their favorite fandoms. Through its iconic Pop! vinyl figures, apparel, and accessories, the company translates the worldâ€™s most popular movies, shows, and digital creators into tangible collectibles.

item.title: Creating a Place Where Talents Shine the Brightest: The Role of a Talent Manager
item.author: COVER_iwasaki
item.content:encoded: Yes. To be honest, these initiatives stemmed from a strong reflection that, as the organization expands rapidly, the systems in place to support talents were unable to keep up with that growth.Â Until now, hololive production has grown through close collaboration built on deep, one-on-one relationships of trust between talents and their managers. However, when information is contained solely within these â€œclose relationships,â€ a challenge emerges: as the scale of activities expanded, it became difficult for the organization as a whole to provide swift backup support.Â There were, in fact, instances in which delayed the sharing of information, such as that concerning the physical condition of the talents, or the response to unexpected situations, resulted in critical feedback that our responses had been â€œtoo slow.â€ We take such feedback very seriously. By relying too heavily on the passion of those on the ground, a single delay ended up placing a significant burden on talentsâ€™ physical and mental well-being, as well as on projects themselves. We are determined not to repeat the regret of feeling like the organization could have acted sooner.The reforms currently underway aim to appropriately visualize information that the organization should share and collaborate on, while maintaining the trusted relationships between talents and their managers.Â While strictly managing the privacy that must be protected, we are moving quickly to establish a system that allows necessary information to be shared in real time with teams and specialized divisions. The introduction of a database and new coordinator positions are not merely about improving efficiency, butÂ of our resolve to ensure that the entire organization has an accurate understanding of each talentâ€™s situation, and can swiftly unite to protect and support them when necessary.

item.title: [hololive] Shop at a convenience store and get a limited clear card!? Usada Pekora Ã— Family Card Campaign Now Rolling Out Nation...
[hololive ID 5th Anniversary] Behind the Scenes of â€œChromatic Futureâ€: Nine Talents, One Bridge from Indonesia to the World
item.author: cover_hirata
item.content:encoded: Across hololive production as a whole, many initiatives are designed to reach audiences both inside and outside of Japan. The Japan-based members, for example, arenâ€™t labeled as â€œJP,â€ and hololive English is grouped not by geography, but by language. In that context, hololive ID may sometimes be perceived as a group with a more limited regional focus. In reality, however, that isnâ€™t the case at all.Â One of the defining characteristics of people in Indonesia is that many grow up exposed to multiple languages from an early age, in an environment that readily embraces diverse cultures. hololive ID talents share these same foundations. Their interest in and understanding of different cultures has allowed them to develop a level of fluency in languages such as Indonesian traditional language, and more, and to use these languages naturally across their streams and musical activities. By incorporating multiple languages and cultures, the talents are able to express themselves much more artistically and, because of this underlying potential, I feel that hololive ID has been able to strike a flexible balance between catering to global audiences and local viewers. Their ability to bridge different cultures and values, combined with a high level of adaptability, is perfectly suited for international activities, and I see it as one of hololive IDâ€™s greatest strengths.Â

item.content:encoded: January 20, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between SPcollect, under IP mixer, Inc., and hololive English -Myth-. Titled â€œMEMORIESâ€, the collaborative fragrance mist series will be available exclusively on the SPcollect official website for a limited one-month period starting Tuesday, January 20, 2026, and is available for worldwide shipping.This collaboration project was personally supervised by Mori Calliope and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis, two members of hololive English -Myth-. Together, they present fragrance mists centered around the theme â€œMEMORIESâ€. The collection captures the concept of â€œThe Scent of Memories We Sharedâ€, blending the unique identities of the talents with an immersive fragrance experience.This product will be available both internationally and in Japan. Pre-order sales will take place for a starting January 20, 2026 (Tuesday) at 12:00 PM (JST) via SPcollect, IP mixerâ€™s collaboration-focused sales brand.â€œMEMORIESâ€ Volume 1 Product Detailsâ‘ â€œMEMORIESâ€ Fragrance Mist The fragrance mists released in this collaboration are formulated as offering versatile usage across a wide range of settings. They can be enjoyed not only as personal fragrances, but also as room, fabric, or bedding sprays, allowing fans to immerse themselves in the fragranceâ€™s world in everyday moments.Both talents took part in the fragrance supervision process, designing the scents with inspiration drawn from the moments they have shared with their fans. Guided by their personal visions of fragrance, exclusive theme illustrations were specially created for this project, further bringing the concept and atmosphere of each scent to life.â– Mori Calliope â€“ Fragrance Notes Introduction Top: Cardamom, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Sweet Orange Middle: Bulgarian Rose, Amber, Cedarwood, Orris Last: Vetiver, Musk, Benzoin, Patchouliâ– Ninomae Inaâ€™nis â€“ Fragrance Notes Introduction Top: Fig, Lemon, Raspberry Middle: Cotton, Tea Leaf, Apple Blossom, Lily of the Valley Last: Cedarwood, Thyme, Juniper, White Musk: Fragrance Mist (100 ml) Ã—1: TWD 1,650 (approx. JPY 8,300)â‘¡ â€œMEMORIESâ€ Fragrance Mist Special Set (with Bonus Items) In addition to the standalone fragrance mist available for purchase, a special fragrance mist set with exclusive bonus items is also being released for this collaboration.The special set includes an acrylic stand featuring a newly illustrated key visual, as well as a clear card printed with a personal message and signature from the talent, allowing fans to enjoy a complete collectible experience.The acrylic stand base is specially designed to be displayed together with the fragrance mist bottle, adding a sense of ritual and elegance to the collection. The clear card features a handwritten message and signature from the VTuber, making this a must-have set for fans looking to collect the thoughtfully-designed fragrance sets by Mori Calliope and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis. Fragrance Mist (100 ml) Ã—1 New visual acrylic stand Ã—1 New visual clear card (Includes Message) Ã—1: TWD 2,100 (approx. JPY 10,560)â‘¢ â€œMEMORIESâ€ Fragrance Mist Special Duo Set (with Bonus Items) A duo set that includes fragrance mists from both Mori Calliope and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis, along with additional exclusive merchandise. In addition to the newly illustrated main visual acrylic stand and clear card, this collaboration also includes an exclusive acrylic charm featuring a special design. Fragrance Mist (100 ml) Ã— 1 New visual acrylic stand Ã— 1 New visual clear card (Includes Message) Ã— 1 New visual Acrylic Keychain Ã— 1 Fragrance Mist (100 ml) Ã— 1 New visual acrylic stand Ã— 1 New visual clear card (Includes Message) Ã— 1 New visual Acrylic Keychain Ã— 1: TWD 3,950 (approx. JPY 19,860)Pre-order Sales InformationFans can pre-order the â€œMEMORIESâ€ Fragrance Mist series through the SPcollect official website (Global & Japan).â– YouTube Livestream Announcement Details and product information for this release will be introduced via livestream by Ninomae Inaâ€™nis and Mori Calliope on Sunday, February 8, 2026, at 8:00 PM (JST). Archived viewing will be available after the stream.IP mixer, a subsidiary of MicroAd, Inc., operates a business focused on planning and selling IP-based products. Collaborating with VTubers and other domestic and international IPs, IP mixer develops and sells original cosmetics, merchandise, and collaborative products for a global audience. Through both original products and tie-up promotions with manufacturers, stores, and facilities, IP mixer maximizes IP value and opens new markets worldwide.SPcollect is a sales brand operated by IP mixer specializing in IP collaboration projects. item.title: hololive x CAPSULE Announces â€œDive into hololiveâ€ Collaboration and Cafe from February 27, 2026!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: January 19, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce the second phase of a collaboration between hololive production, CAPSULE, OU-EN Cafe, and the National Museum of Marine Science and Technology (NMMST): the â€œDive into hololive cafe.â€ Running between February 27 to April 26, fans will be able to partake in photo spots, an exclusive goods pop-up store, and a stamp rally as they dive into the underwater world of Keeleung.For the collectors out there, the NMMST Pop-Up Store is stocking venue-exclusive merchandise, including random shikishi boards, custom noren curtains, and limited-edition clear files. Fans can also pre-order â€œDive into hololive cafeâ€ merchandise from January 21, 2026 at 12:00 PM (UTC+8).For more information on the event, please visit OU-EN CAFEâ€™s official social media platforms. â€œDive into hololiveâ€ is a two-part collaboration event where talents Yukihana Lamy, Ninomae Inaâ€™nis, Koseki Bijou, and Juufutei Raden appear to the fans as â€œundersea princessesâ€ in a new key visual. The upcoming cafe features a fresh visual identity that exudes an ocean theme, with the four talents debuting brand-new outfits that bring a whole new vibe. Expect a totally different merch lineup at the cafe, too!Fans can find exclusive on-site merchandise featuring talents as undersea princesses at NMMST.The first round of cafe merch pre-orders opens on January 21, 2026, at 12:00 PM (UTC+8). As a bonus for joining the fun, fans who purchase a â€œDive into hololiveâ€ NMMST ticket bundle will receive both NMMST stamp rally access and a for limited-edition cafe merchandise to use at the â€œDive into hololive cafe.â€Tickets for the NMMST event are selling fast on KKTIX! Check out the full event details below which includes a merchandise pre-order link, and stay tuned to OU-EN CAFE socials for the menu reveal.Event Information: â€œDive into hololiveâ€ at NMMST National Museum of Marine Science and Technology (NMMST) No. 367, Beining Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Keelung City Feb 27, 2026 (Fri) â€“ Mar 27, 2026 (Fri) Weekdays (Tueâ€“Fri): 09:00â€“17:00 (Closed Mondays) Weekends (Satâ€“Sun): Most areas extended to 18:00 Note: NMMST hours are subject to official museum announcements. Available on KKTIX and ibon* Pre-order bonuses vary by platform and bundle. Get them while supplies last! * Important: The â€œCommemorative Ticket Stubâ€ is for collection only. You must present a valid NMMST Main Exhibition Building admission ticket to enter.Event Information: â€œDive into hololive cafeâ€ OU-EN CAFE No. 25, Jinxi St., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City Mar 14, 2026 (Sat) â€“ Apr 26, 2026 (Sun)Merch Pre-order: Starts Jan 21, 2026 (Wed) at 12:00 PM (UTC+8)
